metadata.title: CVE-2024-39614 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
get_supported_language_variant() was subject to a potentialdenial-of-service attack when used with very long strings including aspecific set of characters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-39614` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 3:4.2.4-1ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3:4.2.4-1ubuntu2.3').
